This page shows how life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population change over time for one country.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

gapminder = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

country_name = "Brazil"

df = gapminder[gapminder["country"] == country_name].sort_values("year")

plt.figure()
plt.plot(df["year"], df["life_expectancy"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy")
plt.title(f"Life Expectancy Over Time: {country_name}")
plt.show()

plt.figure()
plt.plot(df["year"], df["gdp_per_capita"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("GDP per Capita")
plt.title(f"GDP per Capita Over Time: {country_name}")
plt.show()

plt.figure()
plt.plot(df["year"], df["population_millions"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Population (millions)")
plt.title(f"Population Over Time: {country_name}")
plt.show()
